headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for Sensibo - Smart AC Control

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: An API Key can be used instead of username/password, to create a Sensibo API key visit https://home.sensibo.com/me/api

allowRepeatedCommands.title: Allow Repeated Commands
allowRepeatedCommands.description: Allow the plugin to send the same state command again

carbonDioxideAlertThreshold.title: Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Alert Threshold
carbonDioxideAlertThreshold.description: Value, in PPM, over which the Apple Home app will alert you to high CO2 readings.  Default is 1500. Requires the Carbon Dioxide Sensor be enabled

disableAirQuality.title: Disable Air Quality Sensor
disableAirQuality.description: Remove Air Quality and TVOC readings

disableDry.title: Disable Dry Accessory
disableDry.description: Disable DRY mode control - remove extra dehumidifier accessory

disableFan.title: Disable Fan Accessory
disableFan.description: Disable FAN mode control - remove fan accessory

disableLightSwitch.title: Disable AC Light Switch
disableLightSwitch.description: Disable the AC light control - remove extra light bulb

disableHorizontalSwing.title: Disable Horizontal Swing
disableHorizontalSwing.description: Disable horizontal swing control - remove extra switch

disableVerticalSwing.title: Disable Vertical Swing
disableVerticalSwing.description: Disable vertical swing control - remove the 'Oscillate' control from the AC details

enableClimateReactSwitch.title: Enable Climate React Switch
enableClimateReactSwitch.description: Adding a switch to quickly enable/disable Climate React

enableHistoryStorage.title: Enable History Storage
enableHistoryStorage.description: Records all temperature & humidity measurements history to be viewable in the Eve app

enableClimateReactAutoSetup.title: Enable Climate React Auto Setup
enableClimateReactAutoSetup.description: Enables setting up an appropriate Climate React configuration when AC state is set or changed

climateReactSwitchInAccessory.title: Climate React Switch in AC Accessory
climateReactSwitchInAccessory.description: Enabling this will remove the extra Climate React switch if it exists and will show "Climate React Button" attached as a service to the Same AC Accessory (only works when `enableClimateReactSwitch` is set to true)

enableOccupancySensor.title: Enable Occupancy Sensor
enableOccupancySensor.description: Adds occupancy sensor to represent the state of someone at home/away

enableSyncButton.title: Enable Sync Button
enableSyncButton.description: Adds a switch to toggle the state of the AC, without sending commands to the unit

syncButtonInAccessory.title: Sync Button in AC Accessory
syncButtonInAccessory.description: Remove the extra AC Sync switch (if it exists) and show "AC Sync Button" attached as a service to the AC accessory

externalHumiditySensor.title: Enable External Humidity Sensor
externalHumiditySensor.description: Creates an additional standalone Humidity Sensor accessory

devicesToExclude.title: Devices to Exclude (Name/ID/Serial)
devicesToExclude.description: Add device identifiers (Name, ID from logs or serial from Home app) to exclude them from homebridge

ignoreHomeKitDevices.title: Ignore HomeKit Devices
ignoreHomeKitDevices.description: Automatically ignore, skip or remove HomeKit supported devices

locationsToInclude.title: Device Locations to Include
locationsToInclude.description: Device location IDs or names to include when discovering Sensibo devices (leave empty for all locations)

modesToExclude.title: Air Conditioning Modes to Exclude
modesToExclude.description: Select the AC modes you want removed from your AC Accessories in the Home app (leave empty to keep all available modes)

debug.title: Enable Debug Logs
debug.description: When ticked, the plugin will write extra logs for debugging purposes
